alert.note: Alert for La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 8:54PM MST until January 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST MONDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the Abajo Mountains and 1 to 4 inches in the La Sal Mountains. * WHERE...Abajo Mountains. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
